card.name: Evolution Blueprint
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Hettle and Fettle
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". :► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Momodachi Training!!!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 13000 or less. ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Bolshack Momoking
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ Star Evolution ■ Powered Breaker ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

card.name: Momoking -Beginning-
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add a creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. ■ '''Shinkapower''': When this creature evolves, this creature gets +4000 power until the End Step

card.name: Momoking -Beginning-
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add a creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. ■ '''Shinkapower''': When this creature evolves, this creature gets +4000 power until the End Step

card.name: Chotto Q (Regari Star)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Cocco Lupia GS
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ Your Dragons may each cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 1 or less.

card.name: Faerie Re:Life
card.text: ■ Guard Strike ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Moel Mohitch
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ While battling, this creature gets +3000 power.

card.name: Paligiris
card.text: ■ '''Shinkapower''': When this creature evolves, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
